content: I'm about to add some custom fieldsets and fields in CiviCRM, and I recall there was documentation about settings files that I have to modify to make them available in Views. I can't remember for the life of me if that's in Backdrop or CiviCRM documentation. Anyone know offhand? @Laryn ?
It's in civi admin menu, the submenu is "CMS database integration" or similar. Are you using two separate databases?
